hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that a rock on #a ledge in the valley# hides a #generic grotto#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that a room containing a #large pot in the Shadow Temple# holds...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #Arrows (30 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple GS Single Giant Pot

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that a #spider behind a muddy wall# in a grotto holds #a Green Rupee#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Market# is on the path to #the Tower#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that ##Kakariko Village## has #9# major items.

GC (Maze).text: They say that the #Light Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

GC (Medigoron).text: What do you call a group of Gorons?^${12 39 C7}A rock band.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that on the path to the #right hand of the Spirit Temple# a chest and a spider hold...^ #a Magic Meter# and #Zelda's Letter#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Sun Block Room Chest
Spirit Temple GS Hall After Sun Block Room

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

HC (Malon).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Heart Container#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #Epona's Song#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #a Green Rupee# can be found in #the Thieves' Hideout#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that a #storm within Gerudo's Fortress# reveals an #Octorok# guarding a rich pool.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Domain# is a foolish choice.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that ##the Market## has #12# major items.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #the Song of Time# can be found at #the Desert Colossus#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombchus (20 pieces)#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Shadow Temple Small Key# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that ##the Sacred Forest Meadow## has #3# major items.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Gerudo Horseback Archery# rewards...^ #a Purple Rupee# and #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Market# is on the path to #the Tower#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that the #rainbow bridge# leads to #the Deku Tree#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Heart Container#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Fountain# is a foolish choice.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Forest Temple GS Raised Island Courtyard

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the way of the hero.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Nayru's Love#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: Why are they called Wallmasters if they come from the ceiling?

SFM (Saria).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #the Requiem of Spirit#.
